name: Lapras
author: Sekio
flavor_text: These Pokémon were once near extinction due to poaching. Following protective regulations, there is now an overabundance of them.

abilities.name: Go for a Swim
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may look at the top 2 cards of your deck and put them back in any order.

attacks.name: Ice Beam
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
